    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Transmission安装及更换官方UI</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p>相关链接地址：</p>
<p><a href="https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/transmission" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Transmission镜像地址</a><br>
<a href="https://github.com/ronggang/transmission-web-control" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Transmission 浏览器管理界面：Transmission Web Control UI.</a></p>
<p>创建容器 <code>docker-compose.yaml</code></p>
<pre><code class="language-yaml">version: "2.1"
services:
  transmission:
    image: lscr.io/linuxserver/transmission:latest
    container_name: transmission
    environment:
      - PUID=1026
      - PGID=100
      - TZ=Asia/Shanghai
      - TRANSMISSION_WEB_HOME=/transmission-web-control #可选
      - USER=******* #可选，此处设置WebUI账户
      - PASS=****** #可选，此处设置WebUI密码
      - WHITELIST= #可选， 指定可访问WebUI的白名单的ip列表，逗号分隔
      - RPCPORT=19091 #可选，此处设置WebUI端口，默认为9091，和暴露端口对应
      - PEERPORT=51413 #可选，此处设置种子链接端口，默认为51413，和暴露端口对应
      - HOST_WHITELIST= #可选
    volumes:
      - ./data:/config #挂载TR设置文件存储
      - /volume3/TMP/Downloads/transmission:/downloads #挂载TR下载文件存储
      - ./watch:/watch #挂载TR种子监听文件存储
      - ./web:/transmission-web-control #可选，挂载TR WebUI文件存储
    ports:
      - 19091:9091 #NAT转发RPC端口
      - 51413:51413 #NAT转发PEER端口
      - 51413:51413/udp #NAT转发PEER(UDP)端口
    restart: unless-stopped
</code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p>这里主要注意两个配置</p>
<p>指定环境变量：</p>
<ul>
<li>TRANSMISSION_WEB_HOME=/transmission-web-control</li>
</ul>
<p>目录UI文件挂载</p>
<ul>
<li>./web:/transmission-web-control</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<p><a href="https://github.com/ronggang/transmission-web-control/archive/refs/tags/v1.6.1-update1.zip" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">下载UI压缩包</a></p>
<p>解压之后目录结果如下：</p>
<p><img src="https://m.itweeks.top:4443/image/2024/12/27/676e0d2f2c146.png" alt="UI压缩包目录结构" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>将<code>src</code>目录下的所有文件上传到Transmission挂载的<code>web</code>目录下即可(注意不需要src目录)</p>
<p>最终目录文件结构如下：</p>
<p><img src="https://m.itweeks.top:4443/image/2024/12/27/676e0cc42e421.png" alt="目录结构" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>进入transmission目录，启动</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">docker-compode up -d
</code></pre>
<p>访问 <a href="http://ip" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">http://ip</a>:port(这里的port即是RPCPORT配置的端口)即可访问最新的Transmission的UI界面，效果如下:</p>
<p><img src="https://m.itweeks.top:4443/image/2024/12/27/676e0e5949c12.png" alt="Transmission的UI界面" loading="lazy"></p>

</div>
